Package org.apache.jackrabbit.oak.spi.security.authorization.permission

Interface RepositoryPermission

  • public interface RepositoryPermission
    The RepositoryPermission allows to evaluate permissions that have been defined on the repository level and which consequently are not bound to a particular item.
    See Also:
    PermissionProvider.getRepositoryPermission()

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static RepositoryPermission ALL
      RepositoryPermission instance that always returns true.
      static RepositoryPermission EMPTY
      RepositoryPermission instance that always returns false.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean isGranted​(long repositoryPermissions)
      Returns true if the specified repository level permissions are granted; false otherwise.

    • Field Detail

      • EMPTY

        static final RepositoryPermission EMPTY
        RepositoryPermission instance that always returns false.

      • ALL

        static final RepositoryPermission ALL
        RepositoryPermission instance that always returns true.

    • Method Detail

      • isGranted

        boolean isGranted​(long repositoryPermissions)
        Returns true if the specified repository level permissions are granted; false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        repositoryPermissions - Any valid repository level permission such as for example:
        • Permissions.NAMESPACE_MANAGEMENT
        • Permissions.NODE_TYPE_DEFINITION_MANAGEMENT
        • Permissions.PRIVILEGE_MANAGEMENT
        • Permissions.WORKSPACE_MANAGEMENT
        Returns:
        true if the specified repository level permissions are granted; false otherwise
        See Also:
        Permissions.isRepositoryPermission(long)
